meanings.sent1: After the mistake was found, they retaxed the property.

meanings.sent3: The accountant accidentally retaxed the same income twice!
meanings.sent4: The new law will retax businesses that were previously exempt.
meanings.sent5: She had to retax her financial records to correct the error.
